Package com.example.popsicle.rendering

Class GraphicsRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.popsicle.rendering.GraphicsRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback, Universe.Callback
    public class GraphicsRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Universe.Callback, android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback
    GraphicsRenderer class method is to render the image of the universe or of the game on screen.It does so by drawing the universe on the Canvas that is hold by the SurfaceHolder inside the SurfaceView.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GraphicsRenderer​(MainActivity activity, Universe u, android.content.res.Resources context)
      GraphicsRenderer constructor that takes the activity, the universe, and the resources, which is the surfaceView's resources.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void drawSurfaceView()
      The drawSurfaceView method calls the draw method to draw the universe on our canvas.
      void surfaceChanged​(android.view.SurfaceHolder surfaceHolder, int i, int i1, int i2)
      The surfaceChanged method is to call the drawSurfaceView method to draw the game.
      void surfaceCreated​(android.view.SurfaceHolder surfaceHolder)
      The surfaceCreated method is to call the drawSurfaceView method to draw the game
      void surfaceDestroyed​(android.view.SurfaceHolder surfaceHolder)
      The surfaceDestroyed method is to destroy the surfaceHolder that draws the game inside the Canvas when the game is ended and terminated.
      void universeChanged​(Universe u)
      The universeChanged method is to draw the universe again whenever there are changes in the universe (i.e.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphicsRenderer

        public GraphicsRenderer​(MainActivity activity,
                        Universe u,
                        android.content.res.Resources context)
        GraphicsRenderer constructor that takes the activity, the universe, and the resources, which is the surfaceView's resources. The constructor creates the Bitmap for the elements in the universe
        Parameters:
        activity - The MainActivity that creates the game
        u - The Universe that holds all elements in the game
        context - The resources from the SurfaceView in the mainActivity

    • Method Detail

      • surfaceCreated

        public void surfaceCreated​(android.view.SurfaceHolder surfaceHolder)
        The surfaceCreated method is to call the drawSurfaceView method to draw the game
        Specified by:
        surfaceCreated in interface android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback
        Parameters:
        surfaceHolder - the surfaceHolder to hold the Canvas

      • surfaceChanged

        public void surfaceChanged​(android.view.SurfaceHolder surfaceHolder,
                           int i,
                           int i1,
                           int i2)
        The surfaceChanged method is to call the drawSurfaceView method to draw the game. This will be called every time there is a change in the universe.
        Specified by:
        surfaceChanged in interface android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback
        Parameters:
        surfaceHolder - The surfaceHolder inside the surfaceView to hold the Canvas where we draw our game
        i - Integer
        i1 - Integer 1
        i2 - Integer 2

      • surfaceDestroyed

        public void surfaceDestroyed​(android.view.SurfaceHolder surfaceHolder)
        The surfaceDestroyed method is to destroy the surfaceHolder that draws the game inside the Canvas when the game is ended and terminated.
        Specified by:
        surfaceDestroyed in interface android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback
        Parameters:
        surfaceHolder - the surfaceHolder to hold the Canvas

      • drawSurfaceView

        public void drawSurfaceView()
        The drawSurfaceView method calls the draw method to draw the universe on our canvas.

      • universeChanged

        public void universeChanged​(Universe u)
        The universeChanged method is to draw the universe again whenever there are changes in the universe (i.e. position of the characters, etc)
        Specified by:
        universeChanged in interface Universe.Callback
        Parameters:
        u - The universe that has all our elements
